column1: Smoque BBQ////I only had two small issues with this place. First
column2: the ordering/seating was a little disorganized
column3: especially since it was pretty busy. It ended up working out fine
column4: and we got our food quickly
column5: but it was just a little disorganized and confusing. Second
column6: we got a "taster portion" of the ST. Louis ribs. They weren't the best I've ever had (*cough* they were no Twin Anchors *cough*.) They were a little tough--definitely not "fall off the bone" tender that I like.
